name: Super Mario: Magnum Opus (Demo 2)
description:
Originally uploaded on MFGG (Mario Fan Games Galaxy)

The Mario Bros. receive a letter from their so-called "third brother". It leads them to a mysterious new villain with ulterior motives. Equipped with a gun, what awaits Mario in his new adventure?

In this game, you will need to utilize the gun both as a weapon and a method of movement. The recoil force propels Mario in various directions, as well as taking out enemies.

CONTROLS:
Move - A & D/Left & Right Arrows
Sprint - Hold Shift
Jump - Spacebar
Shoot/Interact - O / Left Mouse Button
Aiming - WASD/Arrows for the four directions
Pause - Escape
Cutscene - Enter to continue through dialogue
